definition: the catering industry/the hotel and restaurant business
line of business/industry/occupation/job/employment/school studies/enterprise/property/(Buddhism) karma/deed/to engage in/already

sentences.english: Native of' Sweden, Mr. Genberg has a 24 years hospitality industry experience in Asia.
sentences.chinese: 福金柏，瑞典人，拥有24年的酒店业工作经验。

sentences.english: Therefore, it is of great significance to research the inter-active development between them.
sentences.chinese: 研究其与酒店业互动发展具有现实意义。

sentences.english: It can drive the development of other industries such as entertainment and hotels.
sentences.chinese: 它能促进其他产业如娱乐业和酒店业的发展。

sentences.english: The face of the U.S. hotel industry’s recovery is taking on a different look.
sentences.chinese: 美国酒店业的复苏情况与此前预测的情况将有所不同。

sentences.english: Ester has 12 years of hotel experience with human resources.
sentences.chinese: 郑女士在酒店业从事人力资源工作已有12年。

sentences.english: Similarly, the hotel industry’s revenue and occupancy levels continue to be hard hit.
sentences.chinese: 同样，酒店业的收益和入住率持续遭遇重创。

sentences.english: The hotel industry presents another example of resilience.
sentences.chinese: 酒店业显示出了另一种反弹的例子。

sentences.english: The hotel industry is one of the largest verticals.
sentences.chinese: 酒店业是最大的垂直行业之一。

sentences.english: Adrian Zecha is arguably the top hotelier in the world.
sentences.chinese: 阿德里安泽乔可以说是世界顶级酒店业。

sentences.english: GDH is an industrial trade mark brand that affects China.
sentences.chinese: 影响中国酒店业的标志性品牌。

sentences.english: This paper compares the similarities and differences of management model between hotel industry and property management industry.
sentences.chinese: 文章比较了酒店业与物管业在管理模式上的异同。

sentences.english: In terms of employment, the hotel industry is the second largest industry in this country.
sentences.chinese: 从就业来说，酒店业是这个国家的第二产业。

sentences.english: The economic pain is felt well beyond the hospitality industry.
sentences.chinese: 经济之痛远远超出了酒店业。

definition: line of business/industry/occupation/job/employment/school studies/enterprise/property/(Buddhism) karma/deed/to engage in/already
MICE tourism (acronym for "meetings, incentives, conventions and exhibitions"), aka "meetings industry" or "events industry"
